Key Match Events: Justyn-Henry Malloy drove in the go-ahead run on a sacrifice fly in the bottom of the eighth inning
Jason Foley secured his 27th save of the season by striking out the final batter in the ninth inning
Post-Match Reflections: The Tigers have won 30 of their last 39 games, catapulting them up the standings
FanGraphs gives the Tigers a 96.6% chance of reaching the postseason, compared to the 0.2% chance they had back on Aug. 10
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was part of the Tigers' improbable comeback season
Detroit is tied with the Kansas City Royals for the second AL Wild Card spot, 2.0 games ahead of the Minnesota Twins with three games to go
